page.title: 15A THRESHFIELD CHILD'S DAY
page.content: My name is Amy Harrison and this is a typical day in my life. I get up at 8am. for school.I wear a uniform that varies from Winter to Summer.The television is always on in the mornings.It takes 7 minutes to get to school,which starts at 9.OOam. Shortly after arriving at school one of the teachers will come out and we go into school to begin work.We have three breaks during the day.As the day goes on we may work on Maths, English, Science,Art and possibly the Computer. At home in the evening I usually lay the fire and light it.Then, I usually go out to play.I have my evening meal at 5.OOpm with Mum,Dad and Daniel, my brother.The television is once again on in the evenings. I watch it until the news comes on and then I do my piano practice.Finally I may go out again before going to bed at 9.OOpm..
